subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Detroit Tigers battered Barry Zito for two draining innings, did not allow him to pitch beyond the fourth and continued their successful postseason journey with a Game 1 win in the A.L.C.S.
snippet: The Detroit Tigers battered Barry Zito for two draining innings, did not allow him to pitch beyond the fourth and continued their successful postseason journey with a Game 1 win in the A.L.C.S.
